DOC.detailed_description: Previous randomize clinical trial ( NCT01887028 ) show combine use low intraperitoneal pressure warm , humidify CO2 gas result well clinical outcome ( good quality post-operative recovery less post-operative pain ) patient age 45-75 year , underwent laparoscopic surgery uterine prolapse . Quality post-operative recovery important elderly patient . Investigators hypothesize combine use low intraperitoneal pressure warm , humidify CO2 gas may also result good clinical outcome . In observational clinical trial , quality post-operative recovery QoR-40 , post-operative pain Visual Analog Scale , intra postoperative complication intraoperative core temperature evaluate elderly patient ( 75 year old ) undergo laparoscopic surgery uterine prolapse . Investigators use low intraperitoneal pressure ( 6 mmHg ) warm , humidify CO2 gas laparoscopy . These outcome compare previous randomize clinical trial .
